text: Na ahli kitab nyang tapeucaya Tajok areuta meulimpah-limpah Pulang amanah teuma keu gata Hana meutuka sagai meuubah à Nyang ladom teuma ‘oh tapeucaya Saboh rupia pih han jipeuglah Meulengkan tadong talakee sabe Cit brat that ate adak jipeuglah Jikheun lom kamoe hana meudacha Lagee nyan cara hana meusalah Sabab awak nyan dum buta huruf Sulet that jipruh Neukheun le Allah Narit jih sulet meuhat jiteupue Jikheun cit meunoe sulet keu Allah
